item.title: The Most Distrusted Political Party in Canada
item.description: Abstract During both the 2015 and 2019 federal election, the Conservatives remain to be the most distrusted party according to the Canadian Election Study data. After four years of Liberals in power, more and more Canadians are dissatisfied with the party’s leadership, especially for Albertans and Saskatchewanians. Introduction Election surveys always attract social scientists’ interests. Scholars try to use surveys to guide predictions of election results. For whom people will vote?
